sustainableSchools.question: Is climate action education enough for creation of sustainable school?
sustainableSchools.answer: While the theory is important, it is crucial for the students to put sustainable actions into practice and live up to those values in the future.

sustainableSchools.question: How to tell if a school takes action for sustainability?
sustainableSchools.answer: Look around and find answers to some oppressing sustainability questions as: How much of your food is fresh, local and organic?; Have your dorms and classrooms been retrofitted to be more energy efficient?; What does the school do to make it easy for students to get around without a car?;

sustainableSchools.question: How can students become more eco-friendly on a day-to-day basis?
sustainableSchools.answer: Practice makes perfect! Students must be introduced to the concept of sustainable living and its importance in an easy and fun way. Check the EnRoute Educational Programme to help your school.
